Video - video player widget¶

class pymt.ui.videowidget.MTVideo(video='none', pos=(300, 200), size=(0, 0), rotation=0)¶

MTVideo is a Zoomable,Rotatable,Movable Video widget Usage:

System Message: ERROR/3 (, line 0)

Unexpected indentation.
video = MTVideo(‘source_file’,(x_pos,y_pos),(scale,scale),rotation_in_degrees) supported file types are similar file support of pyglet player class

hideControls(dt)¶

class pymt.ui.videowidget.MTVideoMute(image_file='/usr/lib/python2.5/pymt/data/icons/videoWidgetMute.png', pos=(0, 0), size=(100, 100), player=None, opacity=100, **kargs)¶

MTVideoMute is a mute button class of the video widget

on_touch_down(touches, touchID, x, y)¶
class pymt.ui.videowidget.MTVideoPlayPause(image_file='/usr/lib/python2.5/pymt/data/icons/videoWidgetPlay.png', pos=(0, 0), size=(100, 100), player=None, opacity=100, **kargs)¶

MTVideoPlayPause is a dynamic play/pause button of the video widget

class pymt.ui.videowidget.MTVideoTimeline(min=0, max=30, pos=(5, 5), size=(150, 30), alignment='horizontal', padding=8, color=(0.78000000000000003, 0.78000000000000003, 0.78000000000000003, 1.0), player=None, duration=100)¶

MTVideoTimeline is a part of the video widget which tracks the video playback
